profile.name: OSSS Baseline Profile
profile.description: Minimum viable constraint set for any sports league. Ensures physical feasibility and prevents scheduling conflicts.
suitableFor: Any sports league requiring basic schedule feasibility

required.rationale: A team cannot physically be in two places at once. This prevents impossible schedules.
A venue can only host one match at a time. Prevents double-booking facilities.
Teams need minimum recovery time between matches. 24 hours is the absolute minimum for player safety and logistics.

recommended.rationale: Most venues have availability constraints (maintenance, other events, etc.). Recommended unless venues are dedicated 24/7.

metadata.adoptionImpact: Leagues can be compliant in minutes by selecting this profile
